summary:
I have been working as a Software Engineer for 10 years, focusing mainly on Mobile Application Development for the last 9 years. My experience with Flutter development started 5 years ago, and since then, I have been actively contributing to the Flutter community. One of my significant contributions is the creation of the 'fl_chart' package, which has gained more than 6k stars on GitHub. I also run flutter4fun.com, a blog where I post solutions and tutorials for UI/UX challenges in Flutter.
In addition to these, I have been involved in various side projects using Flutter for the past 4 years. These projects range from game development to security topics like End-to-End Encryption (E2EE). My background in Android Development includes using Kotlin and Java for projects in sectors such as Maps and Navigation, Social Media, Shopping, Fin-Tech, and E-commerce.
App Logik GmbH is a software agency company that develops and maintains different kinds of projects for different products.
As a Senior Flutter Developer, I could help the team use the clean architecture and bloc pattern (as a state management solution) in the company.
Developed Changefly.org, a Silicon Valley initiative for privacy protection, during free weekends.
Interned in E2EE logic and Flutter state management, later continuing as a developer.
Enhanced expertise in Bloc/Clean Architecture, E2EE (sodium_libs), Unit Testing, and Flutter Isolates.
Experienced in Flux, MVVM, and Clean Architecture
Implemented several key features of the application using Kotlin, Java, JetPack, RxJava, Dagger, Mapbox and Retrofit
Designed a scalable real-time chat system using gRPC
Enhanced app stability, achieving 99.7% crash-free sessions and reducing slow renderings by 70%
Mentored new team members in developing complex features within an agile/scrum framework
Created a Flutter-based desktop debugger app for Flux actions and change logs, and developed the flutter_poolakey package for in-app purchases in Cafebazaar's Flutter apps
Developed an app to let users choose their customized burger to order
Solved some complex UI Challenges, for example implementing expandable pages embedded in a List
Developed several Android apps on different topics such as e-commerce and Advertisement
Made a base app and integrated it with a panel written in PHP to build an app with different configs automatically for different customer needs
Experienced in the MVP architecture pattern
Wrote manual test cases for the company's critical scenarios

communityAndOpenSource.title: FL Chart Library
communityAndOpenSource.summary: FL Chart is a package I created for Flutter, popular with more than 6k stars on GitHub and about 5k likes on pub.dev. It provides easy-to-use, animated charts, making it well-liked in the Flutter community for its straightforward data display

communityAndOpenSource.title: Flutter4fun.com Blog
communityAndOpenSource.summary: Flutter4Fun is a blog I started, fueled by my addiction to solving complex UI/UX challenges

honorsAndAwards.title: First Place in the Fanavard Contest
Fifth Place in the Sharif Mobile App Marathon
